coded_answer.p: I'mI've just finishfinished reading the letter from you about wonwinning first prize in your competition - two weeks at Camp California in the U.S.A. You had askasked me for some further information.

I would like to travel onin the July only Becausebecause I'll be free for the whole month. So any date onin the July. I'd like to accommodationstay at Camp California in tents. Because, because iI like to sleep in a tent when iI go camping. Also I would like to choose the two activities that you hadhave gavegiven me on the listfrom the list that you have given me. I would like to choose Swimming and Photography. I'm good inat swimming. I used to swim for the school team. But I never dohave never done photography before. I love to take a photophotos but never have a chance to do so. But I have a chance to choose.

Also I would like to ask you some questions. Do I have to bring a lots of money? I mean do I have to pay for the tent? What about the clothes do? Do I have to bring a lot? That is all iI want to know. Thank you
Hi, how are you? I'm fine. I just got your letter yesterday. You had askasked me a question about my experience of helping at a pop concert. You wanted me to tell you about it, right?

Well, it was quite fun while iI was helping them to do the stuff before the concert was gonna startstarted. I havehad to get everythingseverything that they needneeded up to the stairstairs. It'sIt was so triedtiring. Then after that I havehad to help them carry all the clothes for the singer to wear from the bus down in tointo the stuffstaff room. I saw Westlife too you. You know they are so cute. Then I cancould take a rest for about 30 mins. After that iI havehad to go in tointo the stuffstaff room again because they wanted me to go and buy some drink for the singer. After iI came back iI havehad to help them clean all the make upmake-up stuff. The concert beginbegan... thatThat meanmeant iI cancould take a rest until the concert finishfinished. After the concert had finishfinished iI havehad to help them again to clean all the stuff., theI had carryto carry everythingseverything that I cancould carry back to the bus. We were so triedtired but it'sit was good fun. I think this experience was quite interesting. If somebody askasked me to go and help again I would like to go for sure.
That's all iI did inat the pop concert for my experience. What about your experience? Don't forget to tell me about yours, okay... Better go to sleep now. Bye
